H0.text: In which US city did the 2004 remake of the film Alfie take place. Los Angeles

H1.text: In which US city did the 2004 remake of the film Alfie take place. Chicago

H2.text: In which US city did the 2004 remake of the film Alfie take place. San Francisco

H3.text: In which US city did the 2004 remake of the film Alfie take place. Ny

A4.text: New York City locations featured Park Avenue and the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel.

A5.text: The film was shot throughout England, with locations doubling for New York City, along with on-set shooting in Manhattan.
